name: Model Sisters
description:
This is a game in which the photographer helps the model sisters pose correctly.
In the game you act as a photographer, your model is a pair of sisters. The sisters were asked to pose in groups of mirror images. The elder sister is very professional, while the younger sister often makes the wrong moves. As a photographer, you need to point out your sister's mistakes and help her correct her posture.
· Multiple scenes, free angles
· Sisters wear the same costumes on the same level
· Sisters will mirror pose
· My sister always makes mistakes
· Find sister's error and pass the level
